item.description:
Price: $25.00 per person for 9 holes

Anyone interested in playing golf this Saturday at 4:00 at the Green Harbor Golf Course?  It's a nice course!!

Weather:

Golf will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. I will send an email to cancel that afternoon or the night before. So check your email if the weather seems questionable. However, we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not assume a cancellation unless you recieve an email saying so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 9 Holes of Golf
